devdoc.author: Guillermo Salazar
devdoc.details: It is used by the owner to register employees and transfer payrolls.

params._employeeType: the type of employee in the company.
params._newEmployee: the addres of the new employee.
params._preferedTokenPayment: preferred token payment associated to the employee.

addEmployee(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes3.return: true if the employee is added in this company. Otherwise it returns false.

getInfo().return: a company struct with the company information.

isCompanyPaused().return: true if the company is paused. Otherwise it returns false.

pause(bytes32).details: It must be executed by the company owner.

params._reason: why the company is being paused.

pause(bytes32).return: true if the company is paused. Otherwise it returns false.

payWithTokens((address,address,address,u.details: It calls StablePay smart contract. So it needs to create an Order struct.

params._payment: contains all the payment and employee information.

payWithTokens((address,address,address,u.return: true if the payment is transfered. Otherwise it returns false.

unpause().details: It must be executed by the company owner.
unpause().return: true if the company is unpaused. Otherwise it returns false.

addEmployee(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes3.notice: It add a new employee to this company.

getEmployees().notice: It gets all the employees registered in the company.

isCompanyPaused().notice: It returns whether this company is paused or not.

pause(bytes32).notice: It pauses this company due to a specific reason.

payWithTokens((address,address,address,u.notice: It transfer the payroll to a specific employee.

userdoc.notice: This represents a register company in the platform.
